titleStmt.title: The copy of two letters sent from Spaine containing the Kings censure for the rooting out of vices, abuses, and all sorts of briberies and corruptions in his kingdomes.
titleStmt.author: Spain. Sovereign (1621-1665 : Philip IV)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F.K. for William Lee, and are to bee sold at his shop in Fleetstreete, at the Golden Bucke, neere Serieants Inne,

notesStmt.note: First letter signed: Yo el Rey.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleetstreete, at the Golden Bucke, neere Serieants Inne
